title: Active Learning Design for Mobile-Based Social Science Online Lectures

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Strengthening Practical Competencies in Social Fields via Project-Based Assessment in Smartphone-Centric Limited Technical Environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete over 80% of social phenomenon analysis tasks using online discussion and collaboration tools.
Learners can design mobile learning content based on evidence-based e-learning principles and complete peer evaluations at least twice.
Learners can write project reports addressing real-world social issues and achieve over 70% incorporation of peer feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
